Invite a guest to join your stream from: 從瀏覽器邀請來賓加入您的直播。
Guest Cam is currently listening for con: 來賓攝影機目前正在監聽連接的來賓，但尚未向您的來賓廣播您的麥克風和網路攝影機。
No microphone source is selected. Your g: 沒有選擇麥克風來源。您的來賓無法聽到您的聲音。
No webcam source is selected. Your guest: 沒有選擇網路攝影機來源。您的來賓無法看到您。
The webcam and microphone source you sel: The webcam and microphone source you select below will be broadcast to your guests.
A guest has joined - click to show: 來賓已加入 - 按一下可顯示
Copy and share a link with your guest. W: 複製並與您的來賓分享連結。他們加入時，會可以看到和聽到您。
Verify their identity in the preview are: 在預覽區域確認其身分。準備好之後，按一下「在直播上顯示」將他們加入到您的直播。
Enjoy your stream! Adjust their volume,: 享受您的直播！調整他們的音量，建立新連結，並從屬性視窗變更您的麥克風與攝影機。
Don't share your invite link with anyone: 不要與任何不想讓其出現在您直播的人，分享您的邀請連結。您可以產生新連結來使舊連結失效。不要在直播中顯示此視窗。
Collab Cam is not yet sending your video: Collab Cam 尚未傳送您的視訊和音訊給來賓。啟動 Collab Cam 嗎？
%{name} has invited you to join their st: %{name} 已邀請您加入其直播。當您準備好要加入時，請按一下下方按鈕。
You are connected as a guest using someo: 您使用某人的邀請連結以來賓身分連線。若要離開，請按一下中斷連線按鈕。
This guest is not assigned to a source: This guest is not assigned to a source
The source %{sourceName} is already occu: The source %{sourceName} is already occupied by %{guestName}. If you continue, %{guestName} will be unassigned.
Are you sure you want to unassign %{gues: Are you sure you want to unassign %{guestName} from the source?
Are you sure you want to disconnect %{gu: Are you sure you want to disconnect %{guestName}?
If you want to prevent this guest from r: If you want to prevent this guest from rejoining, you should also regenerate your invite link.
